abstract: Gymboree, the children’s apparel retailer, has hired Goldman Sachs to begin a formal auction of the company, that is expected to fetch more than $1 billion, The New York Post said.
snippet: Gymboree, the children’s apparel retailer, has hired Goldman Sachs to begin a formal auction of the company, that is expected to fetch more than $1 billion, The New York Post said.
lead_paragraph: Gymboree, the children’s apparel retailer, has hired Goldman Sachs to begin a formal auction of the company, that is expected to fetch more than $1 billion, The New York Post said.

headline.main: Gymboree Said to Ready Itself for Auction
